name: é
letter sound: ए / e => मेत्ता / mettā (pāli short e)

name: é s čárkou
letter sound: ए / e => देव / deva (pāli long e)

name: ó
letter sound: ओ / o => potthaka / पोत्थक (pāli short o)

name: ó s čárkou
letter sound: ओ / o => लोक / loka (pāli long o)

name: kvé
speciality: in loan words || replaced with kv when naturalized

name: ú s čárkou
letter sound: ऊ / ū => ऊन / ūna (ball of yarn)

name: ů s kroužkem
letter sound: ऊ / ū => ऊन / ūna (ball of yarn)

name: dvojité vé
speciality: in loan words || replaced with v when naturalized
